info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 4:09PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL TULARE COUNTY THROUGH 445 PM PDT... At 408 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm just southeast of Camp Nelson and north of Johnsondale. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. Localized heavy rainfall may result in nuisance flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Localized heavy rainfall may result in nuisance flooding. Locations impacted include... Johnsondale, Ponderosa, and Peppermint. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
